sentences.en: A miserly father make a prodigal son.
A miserly father makes a prodigal son.
sentences.cn: 老子守财奴,儿子败家子.

sentences.en: Being a student today with miserly grants and limited career prospects is difficult.
sentences.cn: 现今，做一名补助金少得可怜、职业前景渺茫的学生非常不容易。

sentences.en: He is miserly with both his time and his money.
sentences.cn: 他对时间和金钱都非常吝啬。

sentences.en: He is more miserly than economical.
sentences.cn: 5与其说他很节省,不如说他很小气.

sentences.en: He is so miserly he won't buy things he relly needs.
sentences.cn: 他是个守财奴,连自己确实需要的东西都舍不得买.

sentences.en: He is wise and miserly and you cannot skin him out of money.
sentences.cn: 他既聪明又小气,你从他那里是根本骗不到钱的.
他留下一点吝啬的小费.

sentences.en: Inn host is very miserly, what give everyday is dietary and very few.
sentences.cn: 客店主人很吝啬, 天天给的饭食很少.

sentences.en: Low - flush toilets and miserly showerheads mandated in 1992 produced years of consumer grumbling and disobedience.
sentences.cn: ;在92年采用的节水马桶和喷头的命令引起了数年后消费者的牢骚和抗命.

sentences.en: Lying on his deathbed the rich, miserly old man calls to his longsuffering wife.
sentences.cn: 将死的富豪躺在病床上, 可怜的老人叫来他将要熬出头的娇妻.

sentences.en: Now, my uncle seemed so miserly that I was struck dumb by this sudden generosity.
sentences.cn: 原来似乎是非常小气的伯伯竟突然间慷慨起来,这倒一下子把我弄得目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: She's so miserly that she won't give anything to anyone.
sentences.cn: 她如此吝啬,不给任何人任何东西.

sentences.en: Sim did a phenomenal job presenting the heartless, miserly, self - centered Scrooge.
sentences.cn: 他成功地演绎了这个无情 、 吝啬 、 自我 中心的主人翁.

words.tran_cn: 守财奴；吝啬鬼；（石油工程上用的）凿井机
